00008 char* baseGetValidImagePath(const char* s) {
00009   char* file;
00010 
00011   file = MEM_ALLOC_N(char, IMG_LENGTH+2);
00012 
00013   strncpy(file, s, 6);
00014   file[6] = '.';
00015   strncpy(file+7, s+6, 3);
00016   file[10] = '\0';
00017 
00018   return file;
00019 }

00021 int baseIsValidIdentifier(const char* name) {
00022   char* endptr;
00023   int i;
00024 
00025   i = strtol(name, &endptr, 10);
00026   if ((endptr == name) || (endptr == '\0') || strlen(endptr) != 3 || ((strncmp(endptr, "jpg", 3)) &&
00027         strncmp(endptr, "gif", 3) && (strncmp(endptr, "png", 3))))
00028     return 1;
00029   else
00030     return 0;
00031 }

00033 int baseReadArtworkRecord(FILE *base, artwork_info *info)
00034 {
00035   if (!base || !info) {
00036     return 1;
00037   }
00038 
00039   fgets(info->title, TITLE_LENGTH+1, base);
00040   stripWhiteSpace(info->title);
00041   fgets(info->type, TYPE_LENGTH+1, base);
00042   stripWhiteSpace(info->type);
00043   fgets(info->author, AUTHOR_LENGTH+1, base);
00044   stripWhiteSpace(info->author);
00045   fgets(info->year, YEAR_LENGTH+1, base);
00046   stripWhiteSpace(info->year);
00047   fgets(info->value, VALUE_LENGTH+1, base);
00048   stripWhiteSpace(info->value);
00049   fgets(info->img, IMG_LENGTH+1, base);
00050   stripWhiteSpace(info->img);
00051 
00052   return 0;
00053 }

00055 int baseWriteData(FILE *file, artwork_info *info)
00056 {
00057   /* Return error if the file or struct pointers are NULL. */
00058   if (!file || !info) {
00059     return 1;
00060   }
00061 
00062   fseek(file, 0, SEEK_END);
00063 
00064   fprintf(file, "%-200s",   info->title);
00065   fprintf(file, "%-100s",   info->type);
00066   fprintf(file, "%-125s",   info->author);
00067   fprintf(file, "%-4s",     info->year);
00068   fprintf(file, "%-12s",    info->value);
00069   fprintf(file, "%-9s",     info->img);
00070 
00071   fflush(file);
00072 
00073   return 0;
00074 }
